snippet: The inflation rate in the currency bloc was zero in April, after months in negative territory, but unemployment was stuck at 11.3 percent in March.
lead_paragraph: The inflation rate in the currency bloc was zero in April, after months in negative territory, but unemployment was stuck at 11.3 percent in March.

headline.main: Eurozone Consumer Prices Stopped Falling in April
headline.print_headline: Eurozone Consumer Prices Stopped Falling in April
